pullRequest.title: xds: create singleton XdsClient object (promote ClientXdsClient)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Implemented SharedXdsClientPoolProvider, which is a global XdsClientPoolFactory that multiple gRPC clients will call to obtain an ObjectPool<XdsClient> instance.

The first call of SharedXdsClientPoolProvider.getXdsClientPool() reads the xDS bootstrap file and creates the xDS channel. XdsInitializationExceptions are propagated up from the downstreams. It returns a thread-safe ObjectPool<XdsClient> with ref-counting applied to the XdsClient it returns to its callers.
The first call of ObjectPool<XdsClient>.getObject() creates the XdsClient instance.

Note, it seems not ideal to read bootstrap file and create the xDS channel before the actually creating the XdsClient instance. But ObjectPool<XdsClient>.getObject() interface does not throw any exception, we have no way for error propagation (throwing RuntimeException may not good for its API). This is one limitation of the implementation.
This PR promotes ClientXdsClient introduced in #7533, which is an XdsClient implementation with its independent synchronization mechanism.

commit.message: Add a new XdsClientPoolFactory interface that takes responsibility for reading bootstrap file and create the xDS channel.
Implement an XdsClient factory that creates singleton XdsClient object pool and XdsClient.
